unnormalised: Remember, for newborns, a normal temp is around 97.5-99.5°F, and always consult your pediatrician for dosage info on meds like Calpol (Paracetamol) if baby has a fever > 100.4°F.
normalised: Remember, for newborns, a normal temperature is around ninety seven point five to ninety nine point five degree fahrenheit, and always consult your pediatrician for dosage information on meds like Calpol (Paracetamol) if baby has a fever greater than one hundred point four degree fahrenheit.
